title: bisync through Dropbox+crypt constantly critically fails due to off-by-one differences in modtime
body:
#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

Almost everytime I run bisync first on one of my devices and then the other, bisync fails due to modtimes of multiple(not all) files on one of the endpoints being off by 1s


#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

Android 14(crDroid): `v1.66.0-termux`
Manjaro Linux: `v1.67.0`


#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)

Dropbox, accessed through the crypt backend.

#### The command you were trying to run

On desktop: `rclone bisync Local:Documents/WorkingDocs Dropbox_crypt:WorkingDocs --fast-list --checkers 64 --transfers 32`

On mobile: `rclone bisync Dropbox_crypt:WorkingDocs Local:storage/shared/share/WorkingDocs --fast-list --checkers 64 --transfers 32`


#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag

I don't want to repeat the failure yet again, so here's the self-explanatory output without the flag, with filenames anonymized:

```
2024/08/19 15:14:55 NOTICE: bisync is IN BETA. Don't use in production!
2024/08/19 15:15:08 ERROR : -          Modtime not equal in listing. Path1: 2022-03-20 19:14:59 +0000 UTC, Path2: 2022-03-20 19:14:58 +0000 UTC - Path1/File1.md
2024/08/19 15:15:08 ERROR : -          Modtime not equal in listing. Path1: 2021-05-14 11:59:18 +0000 UTC, Path2: 2021-05-14 11:59:17 +0000 UTC - Path1/Subdirectory/File2.pdf
2024/08/19 15:15:08 ERROR : -          Modtime not equal in listing. Path1: 2021-05-14 11:56:10 +0000 UTC, Path2: 2021-05-14 11:56:09 +0000 UTC - Path1/Subdirectory/File3.pdf

...this repeats several dozen times...

2024/08/19 15:15:08 ERROR : -          Modtime not equal in listing. Path1: 2021-05-14 11:59:24 +0000 UTC, Path2: 2021-05-14 11:59:23 +0000 UTC - Path4/File50.md
2024/08/19 15:15:08 ERROR : -          Modtime not equal in listing. Path1: 2022-02-06 20:33:42 +0000 UTC, Path2: 2022-02-06 20:33:41 +0000 UTC - Path5/File51.txt
2024/08/19 15:15:08 ERROR : Bisync critical error: path1 and path2 are out of sync, run --resync to recover
2024/08/19 15:15:08 ERROR : Bisync aborted. Must run --resync to recover.
```

#### How to use GitHub

* Please use the üëç [reaction](https://blog.github.com/2016-03-10-add-reactions-to-pull-requests-issues-and-comments/) to show that you are affected by the same issue.
* Please don't comment if you have no relevant information to add. It's just extra noise for everyone subscribed to this issue.
* Subscribe to receive notifications on status change and new comments.
